page.title: 04Schooling:Glenalmond College
page.content: This is a totally{boarding school}with an average of 380 pupils. It is unique as it has a beautiful situation (Scottish countryside) and is within one hour of four major university towns. In 1985, construction was started on a design and technology centre. It is{academically strong}in both arts and sciences as is shown by awards for both. However, many extra-curricular activities also take place. It is felt that these educate the 'whole man'. It also has a Combined Cadet Force, which helps boys in three ways: discipline, learning of new skills and responsibility for junior boys. Due to confusion, the postal address of Trinity College Glenalmond has been changed to Glenalmond College, but remains the above officialy.
